comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Cato Sells, according to the Annual Report of the Bureau of Indian Affairs, covering the period from July 1, 1912, to June 30, 1913. www.archive.org/details/usindianaffairs13usdorich was sworn into office as Commissioner of Indian Affairs on June 4, 1913. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bureau_of_Indian_Affairs lists him as commissioner from 1913 to 1921, but Wikipedi ahas no article in him as an individual
